text: Been attending the service here , for 15 years . Church members are very friendly . Pastors here as well , the way they preach their sermons , its very heartwarming . Praise God for all of their well-to-do ministries as well . Will recommend this church to those who are looking to attend a Tamil service . God bless . üôè
I am a member of STMC and enjoy attending the church. The pastors sermons are lively and i am able to apply the principles taught in my everyday life.
Been here once when i visited Singapore.. Loved it.. Reverence for God is beautiful.. a totally refreshing experience.. I praise God for it
Spiritual area and great for Protestants. The people there are friendly and welcoming so it was a great experience.
Nostalgic atmosphere....gd community....Pastor is very down to earth...Gd choice to worship here
